EmailTemplate.description: Used to alert that loan is maturing in 90 days
EmailTemplate.name: ET26 - Loan Maturity Date in 90 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Loan Maturing in 90 Days - Loan "{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name} Team Member,
{!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Name} is going to mature in 90 days, on {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Maturity_Date__c}.
Click here to view full Loan Details: {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.Link}
nCino
ET26
